hero.title: Red Forge Facility
hero.subtitle: Secure AI development for defense. Premium startup environment with serious security.

vision.title: Why Red Forge?
vision.subtitle: We combine Anduril aesthetics with Swedish security culture. Cool defense tech without the bunker feel.

startup_culture.title: Premium Startup Environment
startup_culture.description: Espresso, standing desks, good lighting. Not a boring contractor – a tech company that happens to work on defense.

serious_security.title: Serious Security
serious_security.description: Badge readers, data diode, physically separated zones. Security that looks intentional, not paranoid.

collaboration.title: Open + Secure
collaboration.description: Client meetings in open zone. Fika in common area. Deep work behind the red door. Smooth flow.

tech_hub.title: Sweden's Tech Ecosystem
tech_hub.description: Close to Saab, FOI, universities and defense innovation environment. Part of Swedish defense tech tradition.

facility.title: The Facility
facility.subtitle: Three zones: Open collaboration, professional presentations, secure development.

common_area.title: Common Area
common_area.image_alt: Red Forge common kitchen and lounge
common_area.description: Where the team collaborates, does fika, and brainstorms. La Marzocco espresso, modern furniture, whiteboards.

meeting_room.title: Meeting Room
meeting_room.description: Client presentations and demos. No security clearance required for visitors. Professional but accessible.

secure_dev.title: Secure Development
secure_dev.description: For sensitive work. Only team members with access. Premium development environment with data diode.
features: No windows, climate control, LED accents

location.title: Location: Linköping
location.description: Science park environment with proximity to Saab, FOI, and defense industry. Established security culture.

ebbe_park.title: Ebbe Park
ebbe_park.description: Science park in Linköping. Close to Saab, FOI, and the university. Optimal for defense tech.

linkoping_alt.title: Alternative Linköping Location
linkoping_alt.description: We're open to alternative locations in Linköping with the right security level and infrastructure.
